## panoramaToCubemap() function

Converts an equirectangular image to cubemap

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function panoramaToCubemap(tex: Texture2D, outputCubeMap: TextureCube): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tex | [Texture2D](doc/markdown/./device.texture2d.md) | The equirectangular image to be converted |
|  outputCubeMap | [TextureCube](doc/markdown/./device.texturecube.md) |  |

**Returns:**

void

The converted cubemap
